Package it.polimi.tiw.project.utils

Class SharedPropertyMessageResolver

java.lang.Object
org.thymeleaf.messageresolver.AbstractMessageResolver
org.thymeleaf.messageresolver.StandardMessageResolver
it.polimi.tiw.project.utils.SharedPropertyMessageResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.thymeleaf.messageresolver.IMessageResolver
public class SharedPropertyMessageResolver
extends org.thymeleaf.messageresolver.StandardMessageResolver
The MultiPathMessageResolver class extends StandardMessageResolver in order to customize the place where we can search for the property files for customization by overriding the method resolveMessagesForTemplate.

      public SharedPropertyMessageResolver​(javax.servlet.ServletContext context, java.lang.String path, java.lang.String fileName, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Constructor of SharedPropertyMessageResolver
      Parameters:
      context - the ServletContext for which the SharedPropertyMessageResolver is needed
      path - the directory in which the HTML files are contained
      fileName - the fileName of the HTML file
      session - the HttpSession of the client
